name: places/ChIJAQAwxnz2wokRnDvZVtv4mAA
formattedAddress: 1727 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1727 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text:
The most trash and useless “health” center I’ve ever had the displeasure in visiting. I hadn’t seen a mess like this since moving out of a third world country. They need to close down. Let me share what these people put me through.

On Saturday, September 30 I went there for the first time for a physical and a referral. The phlebotomist called out so they told me to come back the following Monday and also made me a consultation with Dr. Amofah Kwame Okyere at 6pm. When Monday came I called TWICE to confirm that I could go an hour before my appointment with the Dr to get my blood work done and both time one of the airhead receptionist enthusiastically confirmed. I went there and got met with confusion by a man telling me that first of all, the appointment with Dr. Kwame Okyere is over the phone and second of all, everyone left a 4pm… you can imagine how frustrated and angry I was after leaving work early to go there. And the to top it off Dr. Kwame never called me…

COMPLETELY IRRESPONSIBLE. DO NOT COME HERE FIND ANOTHER DOCTOR IF YOURS IS LOCATED HERE.

originalText.text: Don't go here they will give you hell.. my doctor won't even answer me. Karma please I need you
